sourcesContent:
<template>
  <b-modal :visible="internalShowModal" title="Add/Edit Subscriber" @ok="handleOk" @cancel="handleCancel" @close="handleCancel">
    <b-form @submit.stop.prevent="handleOk">
      <b-form-group label="Name">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.name" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Registration Number">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.registration_number" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Address">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.address"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="City/Town">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.city_town"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="State">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.state"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Pincode">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.pincode"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Phone">
        <b-form-input v-model="internalSubscriber.phone"></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Email">
        <b-form-input type="email" v-model="internalSubscriber.email" required></b-form-input>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Category">
        <b-form-select v-model="internalSubscriber.category" :options="categories"></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Type">
        <b-form-select v-model="internalSubscriber.stype" :options="types"></b-form-select>
      </b-form-group>
      <b-form-group label="Notes">
        <b-form-textarea v-model="internalSubscriber.notes"></b-form-textarea>
      </b-form-group>
    </b-form>
  </b-modal>
</template>

<script>
import magazineSubscriberService from '@/services/magazineSubscriberService';

export default {
  props: {
    showModal: {
      type: Boolean,
      required: true,
    },
    subscriber: {
      type: Object,
      required: true,
    },
  },
  data() {
    return {
      internalShowModal: false,
      internalSubscriber: {},
      categories: [],
      types: [],
    };
  },
  watch: {
    showModal: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        this.internalShowModal = newVal;
      }
    },
    subscriber: {
      immediate: true,
      handler(newVal) {
        this.internalSubscriber = { ...newVal };
      }
    }
  },
  methods: {
    handleOk() {
      this.$emit('save', this.internalSubscriber);
      this.internalShowModal = false;
      this.$emit('update:showModal', false);
    },
    handleCancel() {
      this.internalShowModal = false;
      this.$emit('update:showModal', false);
    },
    fetchCategories() {
      magazineSubscriberService.getCategories()
        .then(response => {
          this.categories = response.data;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error(error);
        });
    },
    fetchTypes() {
      magazineSubscriberService.getTypes()
        .then(response => {
          this.types = response.data;
        })
        .catch(error => {
          console.error(error);
        });
    }
  },
  mounted() {
    this.fetchCategories();
    this.fetchTypes();
  },
};
</script>
